(numRXQEntries, numRXQEntries).explanation: A variable cannot have a causal relationship with itself as it represents the same entity;

(numRXQEntries, CPI).explanation: Increasing the number of RXQ entries can reduce memory request stalls and improve instruction throughput, thereby potentially reducing cycles per instruction;

(numRXQEntries, nICacheWays).explanation: The number of receive queue entries and instruction cache associativity are independent hardware configuration parameters that do not directly influence each other;
